None.Name: Pledge of the Giants
None.Description: Enable to become immobile and gain: Shared Pain

None.Name: Shared Pain
None.Description: All friendly units in a 25m radius take only 20% damage. 75% of the remaining damage is absorbed while the rest will be transferred to the caster.
